_sText:
I based this map off of the Ghiaccio level from JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: Ougon no Kaze for the PS2. I had to take some liberties because the game is designed around 1v1 battles, so I had to add more objects in order to make the map more suitable for a deathmatch gamemode.

This is my first real time making a map, I am open to any and all criticism and suggestions.
